meanings.definition: A temporary popular trend or fashion.
meanings.sent1: The new dance crazes spread quickly among the students.
meanings.sent2: Fashion crazes come and go every season.
meanings.sent3: The silly hat craze made everyone look funny.
meanings.sent4: The craze for superhero movies shows no sign of slowing down.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't resist joining the latest craze for tie-dye shirts.

meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the abandoned house crazes his imagination.
